info.task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to link in dropdown
info.title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to a link in the associated dropdown in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information about the dropdown and link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information about the dropdown and link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Role of the dropdown ('list') is conveyed
Number of items in the dropdown (4) is conveyed
Role of the first item in the dropdown ('link') is conveyed
Name of the first item in the dropdown ('Overview') is conveyed
